entry.title: partial collapse
entry.summary:
Author: wylanvanecks

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,356Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: "I have had worse," Eddie acknowledged. "I just‚Ä¶" His lips twitched in a wry grin that somehow just made Buck more nervous. "I had a dream the other night, one where I died on shift. Some people would take that as a sign." "You don't believe in signs," Buck countered, feeling like his ribs were about to crack from the sheer effort of holding in his panic. He felt claustrophobic suddenly. He needed them both out of this fucking wreckage, needed Eddie to stop talking like this. "You told me once that the universe was screaming at me." Eddie opened his eyes, tilting his head a little to look at Buck. There was something so achingly intense mixed with the pain in those brown eyes that Buck loved. OR When an apartment building partially collapses with Buck and Eddie inside, Buck has to keep his best friend alive.

Author: ok555

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,870Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

entry.title: Are those real stars that hang in the sky?
entry.summary:
Author: AccioPav

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,021Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 140

Summary: Buck had a friend that only he could see for as long as he could remember. They shared thoughts, they shared feelings, and they shared the need to protect those important to them. His parents, however, told him it wasn't normal, wasn't right--they told him to stop pretending. Pretending would mean Danny wasn't real, though, which they very much were. He stopped talking about Danny around them, learned to push his friend away at times, and took the pills his parents gave him in the hopes he'd be a perfect, normal, child. Life at the 118 is anything but normal and that's the way Buck prefers it. He has a purpose and he has a family, even if they don't know about Danny. Then Maddie tells him she invited their parents to visit and the secret Buck has worked so hard to keep is pulled to the light, along with one his family has been keeping as well. An AU where Daniel's spirit connects itself to Buck at his birth. Goes through a few major Buck events in the earlier seasons, before diverging from canon during the Buckley family visit during Season 4 (i.e. Buck Begins).

entry.title: They kept me quiet, but you gave me a reason to speak again
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,895Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 233

Summary: If he stays quiet, no one can ask him questions he‚Äôs never going to be able to answer. It‚Äôs better for him to be quiet since his mind is never quiet. It‚Äôs a never-ending cycle of awful flashbacks and memories he would rather forget about. If he had the option to erase the last almost 9 years of his life, then maybe he wouldn‚Äôt feel so destroyed, and that‚Äôs how he feels. He doesn‚Äôt know how to describe it other than that it completely and totally destroyed him from the inside out. His teammates won‚Äôt understand, no one will. Or... Something awful happened to our sweet and beautiful Evan Buckley, and Eddie is the only one with the key to his deepest, darkest secret. If he can unlock the door, that is.
